welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Sigma, a charming city known for its pristine beaches and warm hospitality. We invite you to immerse yourself in our vibrant culture and explore all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Roxas City Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Roxas City Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kalibo Airport handles both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: New International Terminal
terminals.description: The new international terminal at Kalibo Airport was opened in 2012 to accommodate the growing number of international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited during peak hours.
